text: A single headlamp in close up shines directly and brightl Extreme noise and light. Beyond its glare can be seen the outline of a motorized t A young man, Richard, sits in the back, his rucksack besi They travel through nocturnal Bangkok: fleets of tuk-tuks Music and credits.
The bright headlight comes to a halt.  Richard climbs down from the tuk-tuk

When you hit Bangkok, there's really only one place to go The street is busy, full of Thai's and travelers. Richard picks his way through the crowd, his rucksack on He absorbs the scene as he passes boarding houses and hot
(continuing) The Khao San Road is a decompression chamber between east Richard is approached by a young male Thai Hustler who wa
You need somewhere to stay?
I'll be OK, Thanks. Richard politely ignores each of his subsequent offers.
What do you want? Sell your passport? Buy passport? Airli At this last one Richard stops and addresses the Hustler.
No thanks. Richard walks on, the hustler fading out behind him.
You want designer clothes? I get you Versache, Gucci, Arm

text: The noise? Don't worry. You're on holiday.
She means your neighbor. The Scotsman

What idiot would lend him money? It would disappear.
He said if we lent him money h would tell us about a secr
